name: hue Memo
description:
Memorize the order in which your Philips hue system shows colors

hue Memo shows a sequence of colors using your Philips hue lamps.
Your task is to remember in which order the colors were shown.
Starting easy with 1 lamp showing 3 flashes to very hard using 3 lamps showing 5 flashes.
Fun to do alone or in groups.
